greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least positive integer with n factorizations into distinct factors > 1, and 0 if no such number exists.
xref: All nonzero terms belong to A025487.
Strict factorizations are A045778, with image A045779.
The version with zeros removed is A045780.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 06 2020
